sense.def:
Kar je
secret
, je znano le malo ljudem, ki tega ne povedo ali pokažejo nikomur drugemu.

seg.quote: Their work had to be done secretly.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
secret
opišemo človeka, ki dela nekaj, o čemer ne pove drugim.

seg.quote: She had become a secret drinker.
He secretly hoped I would one day change my mind.
Secretly, perhaps, some of them were also a little scared.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj naredimo
in secret
, tisto naredimo tako, da za to ne ve nihče drug.

seg.quote: I arranged to meet him in secret.

sense.def:
A secret
je dejstvo, ki ga pozna le malo ljudi in ti o njem ne povedo nikomur drugemu.

seg.quote: The results of these experiments remain a secret.

sense.def:
The secret of achieving something
je najboljši način, kako nekaj doseči.

seg.quote: Think big! This is the secret of success.
